commenter_a: So let's get this right. She's in the business of making money but she didn't want to accept money and now she's willing to spend money in order to avoid making money. She is logically 'out of business'.
No matter your political views, Mrs. Reagan always showed great class and dignity to the Whitehouse. The love for her husband was extraordinary. May you rest in peace.
post_message: Nancy Reagan died this morning of congestive heart failure at the age of 94. She will be buried at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library in Simi Valley, California, next to her husband. @webpagelink
